name: Pearl (alvaroh)
description:
A submarine descends into the ocean depths in search of a giant pearl. The engine is busted and you must make your way through a hostile underwater world, where the fauna drills holes to the submarine’s hatch, making it spin out of control. Since there is no other way, you better use it to your advantage.

Controls

Hold  A, S, D, F, G, H, J, K, L  to patch leaks

Backspace to restart level
